title-group.article-title: Streamline Diffusion Methods for the Incompressible Euler and Navier-Stokes Equations

abstract.p: We present and analyze extensions of the streamline diffusion finite element method to the time-dependent two-dimensional Navier-Stokes equations for an incompressible fluid in the case of high Reynolds numbers. The limit case with zero viscosity, the Euler equations, is also considered.
